title: BLACKBEARD HAS TWO DEVIL FRUITS?? | One Piece Marineford Episode 486 AND 487 Live Reaction!
author: Unknown Creator
description: A live reaction video covering One Piece episodes 486 and 487, focusing on the shocking moment when Blackbeard reveals his ability to use two Devil Fruit powers.

author: Unknown Creator

title: Population GO - Anime Review: One Piece 486
author: Population GO
description: A critical review of One Piece Episode 486, noting that it was more of a reactionary episode focusing on the aftermath of Ace and Whitebeard's deaths. The review gave it a rating of 2.5 out of 5, characterizing it as a transitional episode that focuses on Blackbeard absorbing the Tremor-Tremor Fruit power.

title: The One Piece Virgin - The Best Arc in One Piece (Marineford Arc Discussion)
author: The One Piece Virgin
description: A podcast episode discussing the Marineford Arc as a whole, describing it as a 'mammoth of an arc' and 'a masterpiece.' The hosts discuss the impact of episodes like 486 where Blackbeard reveals his dual Devil Fruit abilities.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Marineford Arc

title: One Piece – Marineford Arc (Episodes 457 – 491) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the Marineford Arc spanning 33 episodes. The review notes that 'The Marineford Arc lived up to the hype in its last 8 or 10 episodes' and describes how 'One Piece goes extremely dark' during this arc. Episode 486 is part of the climactic final episodes where major events unfold.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Marineford Arc (Episodes 457-491)

title: Never Watched One Piece - Episode 486: The Show Begins! Blackbeard's Plot Is Revealed!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post from the 'Never Watched One Piece' series where the author watches and comments on One Piece episodes for the first time. This entry covers episode 486 and the shocking reveal of Blackbeard's dual Devil Fruit powers.
